TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HebrewCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HebrewCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示希伯来历。

span.span: Represents the Hebrew calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 希伯来语可识别两个纪元： B.C.E。The Hebrew calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.E. 在 common 年代) 和早上 (之前(before the common era) and A.M. (拉丁语 "基督 Mundi"，这意味着 "世界年" ) 。(Latin "Anno Mundi", which means "the year of the world"). 此 类实现仅识别当前纪元 (上午 ) ，希伯来年份5343到 5999 (2239 1583) 公历。This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.M.) and the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). > [!NOTE] > 有关使用 .NET Framework 中的类和其他 calendar 类的信息，请参阅使用 [日历](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars). 在每个以19为间隔的年份结束的每个19年循环中，第三、第六、第8、第11、第14、第17和第19年是闰年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 一年的时间可能为353到355天，具体取决于 Jewish 假日的位置。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 闰年的时间可能为383到385天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. 希伯来历在常见年份有12个月，在闰年中有13个月：The Hebrew calendar has 12 months during common years and 13 months during leap years: |GetMonth 值 (common year) GetMonth value (common year)|GetMonth 值 (闰年) GetMonth value (leap year)|MonthMonth|常见年份中的天数Days in common years|闰年中的天数Days in leap years| |------------------------------------|----------------------------------|-----------|--------------------------|------------------------| |11|11|תשרי (Tishrei) תשרי (Tishrei)|3030|3030| |22|22|חשון (Cheshvan) חשון (Cheshvan)|29/3029/30|29/3029/30| |33|33|כסלו (Kislev) כסלו (Kislev)|29/3029/30|29/3029/30| |44|44|טבת (Tevet) טבת (Tevet)|2929|2929| |55|55|שבט (Shevat) שבט (Shevat)|3030|3030| |66|-|אדר (Adar) אדר (Adar)|2929|-| |-|66|אדרא (Adar Alef) אדר א (Adar Alef)|-|3030| |-|77|אדרב (Adar Beit) אדר ב (Adar Beit)|-|2929| |77|88|ניסן (Nissan) ניסן (Nissan)|3030|3030| |88|99|אייר (Iyar) אייר (Iyar)|2929|2929| |99|1010|סיון (Sivan) סיון (Sivan)|3030|3030| |1010|1111|תמוז (Tamuz) תמוז (Tamuz)|2929|2929| |1111|1212|אב (Av) אב (Av)|3030|3030| |1212|1313|אלול (Elul) אלול (Elul)|2929|2929| Cheshvan 和 Kislev 中的日期因 Jewish 假日的位置而异。The days in Cheshvan and Kislev vary depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 在闰年期间，Adar 被 Adar Alef 替换为30天，Adar Beit 替换为29天。During leap years, Adar is replaced by Adar Alef with 30 days and Adar Beit with 29 days. Adar Alef 被视为闰年。Adar Alef is considered the leap month. Adar Alef 和 Adar Beit 中的所有天的最后一天都被视为闰日;也就是说，该 方法将在 `true` 这天后返回。The last day of Adar Alef and all the days in Adar Beit are considered leap days; that is, the method returns `true` for these days. 日期公元2001年1月1日The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在公历中，相当于5761年凌晨年 Tevet 的第六天。in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the sixth day of Tevet in the year 5761 A.M. 在希伯来日历中。in the Hebrew calendar. 每个都 支持一组日历。Each supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历， 属性返回一个数组，该数组包含该区域性支持的所有日历。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历 ，应用程序应将的 属性设置 为新的 。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个文件，其中包含类支持的日期范围 ，并显示5772年每个月的天数。The following example creates a file that contains the date ranges supported by the class, and displays the number of days in each month of the year 5772. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.hebrewcalendar.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.hebrewcalendar.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 该示例实例化一个 对象，并使其成为希伯来语 (以色列) 对象的当前日历 。The example instantiates a object and makes it the current calendar of a Hebrew (Israel) object. 然后，它会使希伯来 (以色列) 当前线程的区域性。It then makes Hebrew (Israel) the current thread culture. 这会导致公共语言运行时解释与希伯来历相关的所有日期和时间。This causes the common language runtime to interpret all dates and times in relation to the Hebrew calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 类实现仅识别公历) 的希伯来年5343到 5999 (1583 到2239。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期，则结果中的日部分 会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 如果生成的月份超出了指定的年份，则结果中的年份部分 会受到影响 。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此， 如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与 指定的相同 。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 Av，其中包含30天，则指定的日期是该月的30天，而参数的值 `months` 为5，则结果年份比指定年份多一，结果月份是 Tevet，而结果日为第29天，即 Tevet 中的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is Av, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 5, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Tevet, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Tevet. 如果参数的值 `months` 为负，则生成的值 早于指定的 。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的值的属性 始终相等 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以 `time` 通过调用方法来保留参数的属性 ，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例根据希伯来历显示了的多个组件的值 。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 类实现仅识别公历) 的希伯来年5343到 5999 (1583 到2239。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期，则结果中的日部分 会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 例如，Cheshvan 可以有29天或30天，具体取决于 Jewish 假日的位置。For example, Cheshvan can have 29 or 30 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 假设在当前年份中 Cheshvan 有30天，在下一年中为29。Suppose that Cheshvan has 30 days in the current year and 29 in the following year. 如果指定的日期是当前年份中 Cheshvan 的第30天，并且的值 `years` 为1，则生成的日期将是下一年 Cheshvan 的第29天。If the specified date is the 30th day of Cheshvan in the current year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 29th day of Cheshvan in the following year. 如果结果月份不是结果年份中的有效月份，则生成的的月份部分会受到影响。The month part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is not a valid month in the resulting year. 它将更改为结果年份中的最后一个有效月份。It is changed to the last valid month in the resulting year. 例如，如果参数中的月份 `time` 是闰年的第13个月，值 `years` 为1，则结果中的月份 是下一年的第12个月，即非闰年。For example, if the month in the `time` parameter is the 13th month of a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the month in the resulting is the 12th month of the following year, which is a non-leap year. 请注意，即使月份部分未发生更改，它仍可能引用不同的月份。Note that even when the month part does not change, it might still refer to a different month. 例如，Adar Beit 是闰年的第七个月，但 Nissan 是共同几个月的第7个月。For example, Adar Beit is the 7th month in leap years, but Nissan is the 7th month in common years. 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此， 如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与 指定的相同 。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 如果 `years` 为负，则生成的 早于指定的 。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的值的属性 始终相等 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以 `time` 通过调用方法来保留参数的属性 ，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例根据希伯来历显示了的多个组件的值 。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CPP/hebrewcalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/CS/hebrewcalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_AddGet/VB/hebrewcalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的某一天定义为从该年的第一天开始的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如， 对于第一个月的第一天，返回1，在 上个月的最后一天，返回该年份中的总天数，这与返回的值相同 。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . 此 类实现仅识别公历) 的希伯来年5343到 5999 (1583 到2239。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). ## Examples 下面的代码示例根据希伯来历显示了的多个组件的值 。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Hebrew calendar. returns.span: 如果 和 参数指定闰年，则返回值为 7；如果不是闰年，则为 0。

span.span: The return value is 7 if the and parameters specify a leap year, or 0 if the year is not a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持闰月的概念的日历中，闰月可以在特定月份之后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如， 方法返回1到13之间的一个数字，用于指示与指定日期关联的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果一年的第八个月和第九个月之间有一个闰月，则该方法将为 第八个月返回8，为第八个月返回9，在第9个月返回10个月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: is not or .
-or-

exception.span: 小于希伯来历年份 5343 或大于希伯来历年份 5999。

span.span: is less than the Hebrew calendar year 5343 or greater than the Hebrew calendar year 5999.

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 类实现仅识别公历) 的希伯来年5343到 5999 (1583 到2239。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 在每个以19为间隔的年份结束的每个19年循环中，第三、第六、第8、第11、第14、第17和第19年是闰年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 一年的时间可能为353到355天，具体取决于 Jewish 假日的位置。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 闰年的时间可能为383到385天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. 闰日是指仅在闰年发生的日期。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在希伯来历中，Adar Alef 的最后一天和 Adar Beit 中的所有日期均被视为闰日。In the Hebrew calendar, the last day of Adar Alef and all the days in Adar Beit are considered leap days. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将在 `IsLeapDay` 第二个月的最后一天 (2 月) ，每个纪元5年。The following code example calls `IsLeapDay` for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/hebrewcalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 类实现仅识别公历) 的希伯来年5343到 5999 (1583 到2239。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar). 在每个以19为间隔的年份结束的每个19年循环中，第三、第六、第8、第11、第14、第17和第19年是闰年。In every 19-year cycle that ends with a year that is evenly divisible by 19, the 3rd, 6th, 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 19th years are leap years. 一年的时间可能为353到355天，具体取决于 Jewish 假日的位置。A common year can have from 353 to 355 days, depending on the placement of Jewish holidays. 闰年的时间可能为383到385天。A leap year can have from 383 to 385 days. 闰月是只在闰年发生的整个月份。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 在希伯来历中，Adar Beit 是唯一的闰月。In the Hebrew calendar, Adar Beit is the only leap month. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 `IsLeapMonth` 当前纪元中的五年内调用所有月份。The following code example calls `IsLeapMonth` for all the months in five years in the current era. summary.span: 获取 类型支持的最早日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the type.

value.span: 类型支持的最早日期和时间，该日期和时间等效于 1 月1日，公元1583

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is equivalent to the first moment of January, 1, 1583 C.E.
in the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Visual Basic 将一天中的时间表示为类型所支持的最小日期的指定时间 ，即公元0001年1月1日Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by the type, which is January 1, 0001 C.E. 但是，该 类型不支持该最小日期。However, the type does not support that minimum date. 因此，如果您调用方法以使用当前日历设置日期的时间，但不指定格式说明符，则格式设置将使用 ISO 8601 可排序 ( "s" ) 日期/时间模式格式说明符，而不是默认的常规 ( "G" ) 日期/时间模式格式说明符。Consequently, if you call a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but you do not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [标准日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings)。For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取日历的最小值和最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/CPP/hebrewcalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/CS/hebrewcalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.HebrewCalendar_MinMax/VB/hebrewcalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回设置为指定纪元中指定日期和时间的 。

span.span: Returns a that is set to the specified date and time in the specified era.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法非常有用，因为它可以将当前日历中的任何日期转换为公历日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 以后可以使用公历日期来比较不同日历中的日期或在特定日历中创建等效日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar. 此 类实现仅识别公历) 的希伯来年5343到 5999 (1583 到2239。This implementation of the class recognizes only the Hebrew years 5343 to 5999 (1583 to 2239 in the Gregorian calendar).

exception.span: 、、 或 超出了当前 对象支持的范围。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 从 0 到 99 的两位数年份，或者从 5343 到 5999 的四位数希伯来历年份。

span.span: A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Hebrew calendar year from 5343 through 5999.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a 4-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 如果 参数是两位数年份，则返回值是对应的四位数年份。

span.span: If the parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.

returns.span: 如果 参数是四位数年份，则返回值是未更改的 参数。

span.span: If the parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 `year` 参数、 属性和年份来计算四位数年份。The method uses the `year` parameter, the property, and a year to calculate a 4-digit year. 通过 `year` 在该100年范围内查找参数的唯一匹配项来确定纪元。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the `year` parameter within that 100-year range. 例如，如果 设置为5729，则100年范围是从5630到5729。For example, if is set to 5729, the 100-year range is from 5630 to 5729. 因此，值30被解释为5630，而值29则解释为5729。Therefore, a value of 30 is interpreted as 5630, while a value of 29 is interpreted as 5729. 如果 属性具有特殊值99，则该 方法将忽略 "控制面板" 中 "区域和语言选项" 中的设置，并返回 `year` 未更改的参数值。If the property has the special value 99, the method ignores the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel and returns the value of the `year` parameter unchanged. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 如果将两位数的年份值 (小于 100) ，则会使方法根据表示相应世纪的值将值转换为四位值 。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供了在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值 ，则该方法将返回实际输入值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供了一个在支持的日历范围之外的四位数值，或者如果它提供负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

span.span: is less than 0.
-or-
is less than or greater than .

Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许将两位数的年份正确翻译为四位数年份。The property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果将此属性设置为5729，则100年范围是从5630到5729。For example, if this property is set to 5729, the 100-year range is from 5630 to 5729. 因此，两位数值30被解释为5630，而两位数字的值29则解释为5729。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 5630, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 5729. 此属性的初始值派生自控制面板的 "区域和语言选项" 部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 如果初始系统设置在应用程序的生存期内发生更改，则 类不会自动检测更改。If the initial system setting changes during the life of your application the class does not automatically detect the change. 特殊值99使 方法忽略系统设置并返回指定年份不变。The special value 99 causes the method to ignore the system settings and return the specified year unchanged.

span.span: The current object is read-only.

exception.span: 在设置操作中，希伯来历年数值小于 5343 而不是 99，或者大于 5999。

span.span: In a set operation, the Hebrew calendar year value is less than 5343 but is not 99, or the year value is greater than 5999.
